text: normal life is attempting to continue
here in lanky on one of the few areas
that are still under rebel control and
it's extremely rare for journalists to
be allowed into rebel areas or to manage
to get into rebel areas because it's
deemed to be so unsafe but we've managed
to get in here we are the first
journalists to come into this town and
they are really protected by these guys
over here the white army which was in
essence a kind of youth militia which
started up quite some time ago and is
under various different controls
localised controls they partly were
involved in the past in in cattle raids
and the like but now these men say that
their aim is to go to Juba the capital
of South Sudan and overthrow the
President Salva Kiir who they accused of
mass atrocities against their people the
newer the ethnic Newars women children
and they say that they will not stop
until they get to the capital and they
overthrow Salva Kiir and they install
react mash are the former vice-president
and newer as the president of this
country
